name: Bubble Pop Puzzle
description:
Do you like difficult games and interesting games? Play one of most fun games. Play without internet. This is a unique brain teaser game.

Play the relaxing bubble pop game! You will like different game modes. Burst the same color bubbles and reach the highest score.

Game features
- Enjoy brain games for adults.
- 2 different bubble game modes
- Simple and colorful design
- Nice and relaxing bubble sounds
- High scores and leaderboards
- Undo option
